languages.text: "Хейнрикс... Хейнрикс же, верно?" {n}Голос Эмелины неуловимо меняется — становится старше и мудрее.{/n} "Знай же. Мне жаль, что я забыла тебя".
"Heinrix... It is Heinrix, yes?" {n}There is a subtle shift in Emelina's voice — she sounds older, wiser.{/n} "You should know... I am sorry to have forgotten you."
languages.original_text: "Хейнрикс... Хейнрикс же, верно?" {n}Голос Эмелины неуловимо меняется — становится старше и мудрее.{/n} "Знай же. Мне жаль, что я забыла тебя".

traits.locale_text: "Heinrix... It is Heinrix, yes?" {n}There is a subtle shift in Emelina's voice — she sounds older, wiser.{/n} "You should know... I am sorry to have forgotten you."
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: “海因里希……你是海因里希，是吧？”{n}艾米莉娜的声音出现了一丝微妙的变化，听起来更加苍老，也更加睿智。{/n}“这些话应该告诉你……我忘记了你，我很抱歉。”
languages.original_text: "Heinrix... It is Heinrix, yes?" {n}There is a subtle shift in Emelina's voice — she sounds older, wiser.{/n} "You should know... I am sorry to have forgotten you."

traits.locale_text: “海因里希……你是海因里希，是吧？”{n}艾米莉娜的声音出现了一丝微妙的变化，听起来更加苍老，也更加睿智。{/n}“这些话应该告诉你……我忘记了你，我很抱歉。”
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: «Heinrix... Es Heinrix, ¿verdad?». {n}La voz de Emelina es sutilmente distinta: parece mayor, más sabia.{/n} «Debería saber que... Lamento haberle olvidado».
languages.original_text: "Heinrix... It is Heinrix, yes?" {n}There is a subtle shift in Emelina's voice — she sounds older, wiser.{/n} "You should know... I am sorry to have forgotten you."

traits.locale_text: «Heinrix... Es Heinrix, ¿verdad?». {n}La voz de Emelina es sutilmente distinta: parece mayor, más sabia.{/n} «Debería saber que... Lamento haberle olvidado».
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: 「ハインリックス…ハインリックスなのか？」{n}エメリナの声にわずかな変化が起きる…声が、より年老い、賢く響く。{/n}「お前に知っておいてほしい…お前のことを忘れてしまって、すまない」
languages.original_text: "Heinrix... It is Heinrix, yes?" {n}There is a subtle shift in Emelina's voice — she sounds older, wiser.{/n} "You should know... I am sorry to have forgotten you."

traits.locale_text: 「ハインリックス…ハインリックスなのか？」{n}エメリナの声にわずかな変化が起きる…声が、より年老い、賢く響く。{/n}「お前に知っておいてほしい…お前のことを忘れてしまって、すまない」
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: « Heinrix... C'est bien Heinrix, n'est-ce pas ? » {n}Vous percevez un changement subtil dans la voix d'Emelina. Elle semble plus mature, plus sage.{/n} « Je veux que vous sachiez... que je suis navrée de vous avoir oublié. »
languages.original_text: "Heinrix... It is Heinrix, yes?" {n}There is a subtle shift in Emelina's voice — she sounds older, wiser.{/n} "You should know... I am sorry to have forgotten you."

traits.locale_text: « Heinrix... C'est bien Heinrix, n'est-ce pas ? » {n}Vous percevez un changement subtil dans la voix d'Emelina. Elle semble plus mature, plus sage.{/n} « Je veux que vous sachiez... que je suis navrée de vous avoir oublié. »
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: "Heinrix ... Es ist doch Heinrix, oder?" {n}Emelinas Stimme hat sich ein wenig verändert – sie klingt nun älter, weiser.{/n} "Ihr solltet eines wissen ... Es tut mir leid, dass ich Euch vergessen habe."
languages.original_text: "Heinrix... It is Heinrix, yes?" {n}There is a subtle shift in Emelina's voice — she sounds older, wiser.{/n} "You should know... I am sorry to have forgotten you."

traits.locale_text: "Heinrix ... Es ist doch Heinrix, oder?" {n}Emelinas Stimme hat sich ein wenig verändert – sie klingt nun älter, weiser.{/n} "Ihr solltet eines wissen ... Es tut mir leid, dass ich Euch vergessen habe."
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: "Heinrix. Heinrix sensin, değil mi?" {n}Emelina'nın sesinde ince bir değişim yaşanıyor, kulağa daha yaşlı ve bilge geliyor.{/n} "Bilmeni isterim ki... Seni unuttuğum için üzgünüm."
languages.original_text: "Heinrix... It is Heinrix, yes?" {n}There is a subtle shift in Emelina's voice — she sounds older, wiser.{/n} "You should know... I am sorry to have forgotten you."

traits.locale_text: "Heinrix. Heinrix, sensin, değil mi?" {n}Emelina'nın sesinde ince bir değişim var. Kulağa daha yaşlı ve bilge geliyor.{/n} "Bilmeni isterim ki, seni unuttuğum için üzgünüm."
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina
